ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: !$Setup.SystemConfiguration__c.ValidationBypass__c && $UserRole.DeveloperName = "Partner" && RecordType.DeveloperName = "Advice_Opportunity" && ISBLANK(SubCriteriaNotes__c) && Est_Liquid_Assets__c < 200000 && NOT(ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Closed Lost"))
